text: Marie-Françoise Clergeau Marie-Françoise Clergeau (born 2 May 1948 in Nantes) is a member of the National Assembly of France. She represents the Loire- Atlantique department, and is a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. On 29 January 2013 she was a major speaker on to the French National Assembly urging the vote for Marriage Equality. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:People from Nantes Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Women members of the National Assembly (France) Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:21st-century French women politicians
title: Marie-Françoise Clergeau
